quotes.quote: Miss Abbott, don't worry over me. Some people are born not to do things. I'm one of them.
quotes.author: E.M. Forster

quotes.quote: By that which you kill are you bound.
quotes.author: O.R. Melling

quotes.quote: You may lie with your mouth, but with the mouth you make as you do so you none the less tell the truth.
quotes.author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quotes.quote: When they have discovered truth in nature, they fling it into a book where it is in even worse hands.
quotes.author: Georg Christoph Lichtenberg

quotes.quote: Life is a bitter sweet journey my friend, a bitter sweet journey.
quotes.author: Luellen Hoffman

quotes.quote: Whereof one cannot speak, thereof one must be silent.
quotes.author: Ludwig Wittgenstein

quotes.quote: Philosophers, for example, often fail to recognize that their remarks about the universe apply also to themselves and their remarks. If the universe is meaningless, so is the statement that it is so.
quotes.author: Alan Wilson Watts

quotes.quote: How wonderful it is that nobody need wait a single moment before starting to improve the world.
quotes.author: Anne Frank

quotes.quote: I had to philosophize. Otherwise, I could not live in this world.
quotes.author: Edmund Husserl

quotes.quote: Let those who want to save the world if you can get to see it clear and as a whole. Then any part you make will represent the whole if it's made truly. The thing to do is work and learn to make it.
quotes.author: Ernest Hemingway

quotes.quote: First impressions are rarely worth preserving. Men typically fall short of our expectations.
quotes.author: Renate Linnenkoper

quotes.quote: Everything is good as it comes from the hands of the Maker of the world, but degenerates once it gets into the hands of man.
quotes.author: Jean-Jaques Rousseau

quotes.quote: Between the mountains of rightdoing and wrongdoing , there is a valley. This is where she and I met. We did not choose to meet. Our destinies had collided.
quotes.author: Avijeet Das

quotes.quote: One's life has value so long as one attributes value to the life of others, by means of love, friendship, and compassion
quotes.author: Simone de Beauvoir

quotes.quote: Wherever you find the greatest good, you will find the greatest evil, because evil loves paradise as much as good.
quotes.author: Wallace Stegner

quotes.quote: Knowledge is responsibility, which is why people resist knowledge.
quotes.author: Stefan Molyneux
